column2: The low walls that surround the castle's small town providing some protection from siege
This barracks is built to maintain the standing army of the Republic.
This complex serves as the headquarters of the Republic’s army.
Holy orders fortify temples, churches and mosques much like fortresses to keep the heathen and infidel at bay
Holy orders fortify temples, churches and mosques much like fortresses to keep the heathen and infidel at bay
A Colonial state either currently or in the past has held this city and constructed a small yet very defensive fort in this city to cement it's rule.
The regional bureau through which all administration of this area is carried out. Its primary function is the collection of taxes and recording census data.
This building houses staffers, accountants and magistrates that help manage the day to day affairs of trade in the realm, allowing the ruler to manage a more extensive trade network.
